==Trivia==
===Etymology=== 
*''{{w|Acamapichtli}}'' ({{w|Nahuatl}}: ''ācamāpīchtli''), means a "Handful of Reed Arrows," and is the name associated with the first ''{{w|Tlatoani}}'' of {{w|Tenochtitlan|Mexico-Tenochtitlan}}.
